queries.query: SELECT "T.ticket_id AS 티켓 아이디, " + "U.user_nickname AS 사용자, " + "M.movie_title AS 영화제목, " + "S.schedule_start_time AS 상영시간, " + "SE.seat_number AS 좌석번호 " + "FROM Tickets T " + "JOIN Users U ON T.user_id = U.user_id " + "JOIN Cinema_Infos CI ON T.cinema_info_id = CI.cinema_info_id" + "JOIN Schedules S ON CI.schedule_id = S.schedule_id" + "JOIN Movies M ON s.movie_id = M.movie_id " + "JOIN Seats SE ON CI.seat_id = SE.seat_id " + "WHERE T.user_id = ?";
